pages.text: $(li)The Crimson Fungus is a type of fungus that is commonly generated in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/crimson_forest)Crimson Forests$(/l) and rarely in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/warped_forest)Warped Forests$(/l) of the Nether.$(br)$(li)It can be used to breed $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/hoglin)Hoglins$(/l) and keep them from despawning, but it does not stop it from attacking you.
